attributes.action: allow voting AGAINST petitions on these pages
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the moment if 10,000 people vote for a petition it looks like it's popular. If 50,000 people think it's a bad idea what voice do they have? Let people vote either way on a petition that way you'll get a *real* idea of what people think.

"Traditional" paper based petitions don't allow those opposed to it to have any kind of voice; lets not carry that idea across into the electronic age!

rejection.details: Thanks for your feedback, we will include it in our review process as we see what has, and what has not, worked during this beta testing phase.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
